comments:
When generating CBE BIRT log reports from the log view the following exception occurs.  

!MESSAGE Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in: "org.eclipse.jface".
!STACK 0
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1
	at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.report.birt.ui.internal.BIRTLogReportWizard.initPages(BIRTLogReportWizard.java:273)

approved by monitor project lead (Dave Smith)
An unnecessary check was removed.  This problem was due to refactoring done in the log view framework.
